授業方法: Under the "Emergency" conditions at the beginning of this term, this class will be held in Online Format: Simultaneous and two-way. If the "Activity Restriction Level" drops to below Level 2 later in the term, the class may switch to Face-to-Face, but under pandemic restriction levels, it is likely to continue online. We will meet using Zoom during the regularly scheduled class time (Zoom link will be given on LUNA.)This course meets once per week and will be conducted in English only. Students will study expectations of both correspondence and report writing for business purposes. Preparation before class—reading the textbook, doing practice activities, and doing writing tasks on computer and submitting them in a proper format—is essential. In class, there will be some lecture, pair work (particularly for peer review of writing), feedback, and limited writing time.
